page.title: 07INFANT SCHOOL LYNEHAM
page.content: I LIKE THE SCHOOL BECAUSE I LIKE THE TEACHERS. I WILL TELL YOU THEIR NAMES.THERE IS MRS GRAY, MISS TAYLOR, AND MRS BARTER, MISS OLLIVE, AND MRS GILBERT,AND MRS O'SULLIVAN AND MRS SIMONDS, SHE IS THE HEAD OF THE SCHOOL AND THERE IS MISS DOYLE AND MRS MENHAM. WE GO SWIMMING AND WE DO WORK ON THE COMPUTER.I LIKE READING AND STORY_TIME STUART MUNRO 7YRS I LIKE MY SCHOOL VERY MUCH .WE DO MATHS. TO HELP US COUNT AND MEASURE AND WE DO READING AND WRITING AND PAINTING .WE ALSO DO P.E.AND PLAY GAMES IN THE HALL. WE GO SWIMMING, YOU START SWIMMING WHEN YOU ARE SIX AND WE DO CLAY MODELS. WEWRITE STORIES ON THE COMPUTER.I LIKE GOING TO SINGING WITH MRS MENHAM.MY TEACHER IS MRS BARTER AND SHE IS NICE .REBBECA IS MY BEST FRIEND . KATY SIMONDS 6YRS
